item.description:
Call 617-576-1819 to order tickets or write to tickets@cambridgesymphony.org

The Cambridge Symphony Orchestra is playing Beethoven's Ninth Symphony on Dec 20 at MIT Kresge's Auditorium with the Cambridge Community Chorus.


  • Fanfare for the Common Man Aaron Copland
  • Symphony No. 9 Ludwig van Beethoven


featured soloists:

  • Rochelle Bard, Soprano
  • Rebecca Folsom, Mezzo-soprano
  • Ray Bauwens, Tenor
  • Robert Honeysucker, Baritone


Tickets:

Benefactor Tickets (with Reserved Seating) are $30
Tickets at the door are $20, $15 for Seniors.
Tickets in advance are $15, $10 for Seniors.

A portion of the proceeds from this concert will benefit the Cambridge YWCA Shelter for Homeless Families.

read about the 9th symphony here at Wikipedia
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting in the violin section, but I WILL SEE IF I CAN SETUP A ROW FOR US, so at least everyone can sit together. Look for meetup signs.
item.name: Cambridge Symphony plays Beethoven's Ninth at Kresge.
